author: TravisEz13
body: Due to the use of unsupported APIs, we must remove the Counter CmdLets in the Diagnostics Module until a better solution is found.

comments.author: jcotton42
comments.body: Will these along with the LocalAccounts cmdlets (#4302) be added back before PowerShell 6 hits release?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @jcotton42 Currently we have no solution but PG actively works to add this back.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @jcotton42 Is there some scenario where the Inbox (or WMF) module does not work?

title: Due to the use of unsupported APIs, we must remove the Counter CmdLets in the Diagnostics Module until a better solution is found.
